readable.title: 2613889835_6f50a3b83b
readable.content: A blue boat and orange boat float among lilypads in an outdoor setting . A man in an orange kayak and a man in a blue kayak paddle around a beautiful lake . Two guys are kayaking , one orange one blue , down a creek . Two men are paddling their small canoes through the water . Two men is separate canoes are in an area full of lillypads .
